Item_Type.Name: Adventuring Gear/Luxury Items
Item_Type.Description: Items which are of use when adventuring or surviving in the wilderness including food, drink, and various forms of illumination.

Item_Type.Name: Special Substances and Items
Item_Type.Description: Items that are not magical but have what could be considered magical properties.

Item_Type.Name: Tools and Skill Kits
Item_Type.Description: Items that help you do something you couldn't otherwise do, such as craft or repair an item, forge a document, or pick a lock.

Item_Type.Name: Food, Drink and Lodging
Item_Type.Description: Items that will satisfy your basic needs by providing either sustenance or shelter.

Item_Type.Name: Clothing
Item_Type.Description: Items worn to cover the body.

Item_Type.Name: Commodities
Item_Type.Description: Items of use and/or value that can be bought and sold.

Item_Type.Name: Mounts and Related Gear
Item_Type.Description: An animal that can be used for either transportation or some other purpose, and any items that can assist with maintaining these animals.

Item_Type.Name: Transport
Item_Type.Description: Items that provide a means of conveying people or goods from place to place by means of a vehicle.

Item_Type.Name: Musical Instrument
Item_Type.Description: Items that are used for playing music.
